changeSet.author: vborovok

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM pg_catalog.pg_proc JOIN pg_namespace ON pg_catalog.pg_proc.pronamespace = pg_namespace.oid WHERE proname = 'add_route' AND pg_namespace.nspname = 'public' )

changeSet.createProcedure: create or replace procedure add_route(method_name varchar, path_val varchar, roles varchar, open_val boolean default false) language sql as $$ insert into routes (method, path, open) select method_name, path_val, open_val where not exists( select from routes where method = method_name and path = path_val ) on conflict do nothing ; insert into manager_role_routes(manager_role, route) VALUES (unnest(string_to_array(roles, ', ')::varchar[]), (select id from routes where method = method_name and path = path_val)) on conflict do nothing $$;

changeSet.author: vborovok

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM routes WHERE method = 'put' and path = '/admission'

changeSet.sql: call add_route('put','/admission', 'admin, oio, oooz, oooz_head, supervisor');

changeSet.author: vborovok
